name: Zucchini Chips
description: Indulge in our Zucchini Chips for a low-carb, low-sugar snack option. Perfect for those on a health journey, these chips are not only delicious but are a part of our Healthy Recipes collection, ensuring you can enjoy a crisp, guilt-free treat anytime.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 220 degrees Celsius.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the steamed zucchini into thin, chip-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, toss the zucchini slices with the extra virgin coconut oil until evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the zucchini slices in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, then flip the chips and bake for another 10 minutes or until crisp and golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
